headline: Philip Morris International Releases 2025 Sustainability Materiality Report
summary: STAMFORD, CT, September 12, 2025--Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE: PM) today published its 2025 Sustainability Materiality Report, presenting the results of its latest global sustainability materiality assessment (SMA). Following the principles of double materiality, the report outlines the key sustainability topics identified, along with their associated impacts, risks, and opportunities (IROs), in line with the EU Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD). Consumers and end us
